name: Amputhief
description:
NOTE: This project is currently in early alpha. Some contents are missing and still being worked on. Current contents are subject to change. This is being released so that feedback can be given during development to further enhance the experience. Thank you for your understanding.

Amputhief is an action RPG where you fight off waves of enemies, claiming their parts as your own to use against them, and cutting off flesh clumps to then use to further enhance your abilities.

Controls:

Keyboard:

Num keys 1-6 - Use parts (In order: Right Arm, Left Arm, Right Leg, Left Leg, Body, Head)

Arrow Keys - Navigate menus/change target

Buttons can also be clicked on using mouse.

Controller:

South facebutton: Right Arm attack

East facebutton: Left Arm attack

West facebutton: Right Leg attack

North facebutton: Left Leg attack

Right Shoulder button: Body attack

Left Shoulder button: Head Attack

Start/Options: Pause (to be implemented)

Credits:

Yuushio - Pixel Art/Coding

Marnic - Character design/CG support

Mairu - Music/SFX (To be completed/added in next version)
